entry.title: From Gotham with Love
entry.summary:
Author: anxiousdepressedintrovert

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 8,703Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 37

Summary: Martha and Thomas Wayne are the pinnacle of success in Gotham. Their daughter, Beatrice, is their crown jewel. One night everything changes. Martha and Thomas are gunned down and Beatrice is kidnapped. She returns two years later, changed. How will Gotham react to the little girl that's returned to them? And the shadows she's brought with her.

entry.title: weak and powerless (over you)
entry.summary:
Author: byzantinedaydeams

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,923Chapters: 2/16Kudos: 53

Summary: Batman doesn’t trust Superman as far as he can throw him. As it turns out, with a little (a lot) of Kryptonite, that’s not very far. While Batman doesn’t normally compromise his rules, Bruce Wayne deals in gray areas. Compartmentalizing has its perks, and they taste like strawberry lip balm. Although it might seem like their common lifestyles as vigilantes make them a perfect match, as they get to know each other better, they each realize that there is more to the other than meets the eye.(Or: Clark gets a metric fuck-ton of Kryptonite stuck in his body and Bruce decides he’s allowed to break his unwritten “don’t kiss Clark” rule)

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 14,932Chapters: 7/?Kudos: 1,172

entry.title: Hiding In Plain Sight
entry.summary:
Author: aster_ion

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 21,664Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 114

Summary: Batman is wary of Superman. He doesn't trust the all powerful alien – he's seen firsthand how absolute power can corrupt an individual. It’s only a matter of time before he snaps.Clark Kent is wary of Bruce Wayne. He's met too many men like him – charming, arrogant, and swimming in more money than they know what to do with. He’s hiding something, Clark is sure of it.Bruce would do anything to learn more about the threat Superman poses, so when an unassuming new reporter with mysterious connections to the superhero takes over the Gotham beat, he doesn’t pass up the opportunity.Seducing Clark Kent wasn’t exactly the plan, but hey, Bruce isn’t complaining.

entry.title: The Buttered Cat Paradox
entry.summary:
Author: writersagainstwritersblock

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 25,362Chapters: 11/?Kudos: 337

Summary: “No comment.”“You don’t know what I was going to ask,” Clark said with a hint of a smile. “Maybe I just wanted to congratulate you on catching the Film Freak.”Bruce gave him a flat look.“Or maybe I think I can help.”“With a case of vandalism?”Clark stepped in front of him. “It’s not vandalism and you know it, detective.”“And what makes you say that?”“If it were vandalism it would be something a lot more juvenile. To the point. It wouldn’t claim there were seventeen missing kids. That’s public outcry.”“Is that so?”“That and I tried to do a story on the growing number of homeless children last month and I got shut down. According to the last count, the numbers have been decreasing, but there’s been no change in policies, no extra funding to CPS, or shelters, or even an increase in the number of inmates in the juvenile detention center. So where are they going?” Detective Bruce Wayne may have the highest solve rate in Gotham, but if he wants to solve this case, he’ll need the help of an elusive street kid, and while Dick Grayson always lands on his feet, he usually lands himself right into trouble.

entry.title: Sins (let me in)
entry.summary:
Author: kitsu_kitkat

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 18,495Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 102

Summary: It all went without much issue, until the big blue giant opened his mouth and uttered the next few words in the same syrupy tone. “That's it, you are doing so good.” Oh. If Bruce was a lesser man, he would have stopped dead in his tracks. As it was, he simply disguised his stumble as an irregular patch of concrete and carried on. Where had that come from? Aka; Bruce needed to learn echolocation yesterday. He should learn something from the bats in his cave, then he wouldn't be forced to have realisations about himself in unfortunate situations like this.

entry.title: We Could Be Heroes - A SuperBat Love Story
entry.summary:
Author: xxEmilee_Lunaxx

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 57,319Chapters: 22/?Kudos: 87

Summary: Bruce Wayne and Clark Kent both maintain a strong sense of justice and fight for peace in their respective cities. However, both are struggling to maintain order alone, and are weighed down by a lost sense of identity and the loneliness that stems from the isolation of living a double life. After a chance encounter, the pair agree to form a Justice League to address the growing threat to Earth's security. As they learn to work together, new feelings blossom, and the heroes soon find themselves leaning on each other for support and comfort.Slow-burn romance. Bat-family drama. Justice League shenanigans. Bruce being a rich kid with issues. Superman being an innocent lad.Heavily inspired by Batman/Superman The Animated Series, Justice League, & Justice League Unlimited. Also takes inspiration from The Batman (2022), My Adventures With Superman (2023), and Batman: Caped Crusader (2024), and Smallville (2001).
